decision_conditions:
<p>All new external facing and roofing materials in respect of all the works hereby approved shall match those of the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance including type, size, colour, bond, pointing, coursing, jointing, profile and texture.</p><p>

REASON: In order to preserve the appearance of the listed host building, wider terrace, and streetscene.&nbsp;</p>

The Development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 18(a) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended.

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">All new works, and works of making good to the retained fabric, whether internal or external,&nbsp; shall match the original work in respect of the materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance including the methods used, material, dimensions, composition, form, colour, finish and profile, unless shown otherwise on the drawings or other documentation hereby approved.&nbsp;</p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-cd96ae21-7fff-7d9d-cac4-ec182e68d35b"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building&nbsp;</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">All existing historic timber windows shall be retained in situ. The development and works shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building&nbsp;</span></p>
description: Repair and restoration of building facade
